item.title: Roger Ver 'Honoured' Recipient of Liberland Diplomatic Passport
item.description:
Roger Ver 'Honoured' Recipient of Liberland Diplomatic Passport

The self-proclaimed micronation, the Free Republic of Liberland, which has claimed a parcel of disputed land on the western bank of the Danube river, is holding a Summer Dinner event on August 26-28. Also read: Legal Identity for All: Can Bitcoin's Blockchain Rise to the Challenge?

item.title: Sandia National Laboratories Joins the War on Bitcoin Anonymity
item.description:
Sandia National Laboratories Joins the War on Bitcoin Anonymity

The Sandia National Laboratories, a major United States Department of Energy research and development facility, with campuses in Albuquerque, New Mexico and Livermore, California, managed and operated by the Sandia Corporation (a wholly owned subsidiary of Lockheed Martin), is joining the war on Bitcoin anonymity .

item.title: Bitcoin's Rollercoaster On Hiatus? | PYMNTS.com
item.description:
Bitcoin's Rollercoaster On Hiatus? | PYMNTS.com

The briny seas of bitcoin have been calm this week. Andreas Antonopoulos, author of "Mastering Bitcoin," is predicting great things for bitcoin's future. We'd like to see his crystal ball. Forex Paradise is diving into the bitcoin space and offering its first bitcoin debit cards, and Bitwala is launching a digital wallet.

item.title: Modify the Bios of Reference Radeon RX 480 For Faster Ethereum Hashrate
item.description:
Modify the Bios of Reference Radeon RX 480 For Faster Ethereum Hashrate

If you are using reference design AMD Radeon RX 480 GPUs for mining Ethereum only or Dual Mining Ehtereum and DCR or SIA and you still not have tried any of the custom video BIOS roms available from Heliox / Eliovp you should give them a try.

item.title: Forex Paradise Rewards $8.6m worth Commissions to Affiliates
item.description:
Forex Paradise Rewards $8.6m worth Commissions to Affiliates

A Hong Kong based financial management firm claims that its affiliate partners have withdrawn $8.6 million worth of commissions since its launch. A Hong Kong based financial management firm claims that its affiliate partners have withdrawn $8.6 million worth of commissions since its launch.

item.title: Coinbase Introduces Credit and Debit Card Support for Its European Customers - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Coinbase Introduces Credit and Debit Card Support for Its European Customers - NEWSBTC

Coinbase customers in the European nations can now buy digital currency using credit and debit cards. Read more... Coinbase is known to capture new markets and introduce new features on a regular basis. Keeping up with the trend, the leading cryptocurrency platform recently announced the inclusion of credit and debit card payments for its European customers.

item.title: Chronicled Introduces New Ethereum-Powered IoT Open Registry
item.description:
Chronicled Introduces New Ethereum-Powered IoT Open Registry

Chronicled, a blockchain startup headquartered in San Francisco, has introduced an Ethereum blockchain-based physical asset verification platform that enables companies and manufacturers to register and verify physical items in an irrefutable and decentralized network.

item.title: 'Wildfire' Ransomware Defeated by International Security Team
item.description:
'Wildfire' Ransomware Defeated by International Security Team

Wildfire, a type of ransomware targeted at Dutch speakers, has been successfully defeated by the No More Ransom initiative, a project coordinated by the Netherlands Police, Europol, Intel and Kaspersky. This multinational collaboration aims to help victims of ransomware retrieve their encrypted files for free through the use of multiple decryption tools.

item.title: Singapore Regulator: 'Consolidated Framework' Needed For Bitcoin
item.description:
Singapore Regulator: 'Consolidated Framework' Needed For Bitcoin

Singapore has announced its intention to simplify regulations on payments in a move that will also recognize and cater to the needs of businesses dealing in Bitcoin. Also read: Japan Risks Falling Behind Amid Blockchain Talent Shortage In a public consultation released today, the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) states its intention to "create a consolidated activity and risk-based regulatory framework."

item.title: Flexible Transactions; first code published. * /r/btc
item.description:
